the §6Chemical Crystallizer§r is a machine that is specialized in well.. crystallizing chemicals. For instance, take §6Iron Slurry§r. Iron Slurry is a chemical that came from §edissolving Iron Ore§r and this machine is one way to §econvert it back into an item§r, in this example; §6Iron Crystal§r. This machine is crucial for the Tier 4 Ore Processing line.

To craft one, you'll need four §6Basic Control Circuit§rs, two §6Atomic Alloy§rs, two §6Basic Gas Tank§rs, and a §6Steel Casing§r.
